arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\" as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PROC_NAME\\" as \\"PROC_NAME\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_NAME\\" as \\"WS_NAME\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" as \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\") as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm999999999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST " +"where " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" and to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and((V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?) " +" or (V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?) " +" or (V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?)) " +"order by " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.PROC_NO"
"select " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"WS_CD\\", " +" M_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" M_WS.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" M_WS.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" as \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"from " +" M_WH " +"where " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" MIN(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PROC_NO\\") as \\"MIN_PROC_NO\\" " +"from " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST " +"where " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"set " +" \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 2, " +" \\"OPR_INST_DATE\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" to_char(SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"BUSINESS_OPR_DATE\\" " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_EDITION\\" as \\"PS_EDITION\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_QTY\\" as \\"PS_UNIT_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\") as \\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\") as \\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_SPOIL\\" as \\"PS_SPOIL\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_ISSUE_INST(\\"ISSUE_INST_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"PS_EDITION\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_QTY\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_QTY\\", \\"TOTAL_ISSUE_QTY\\", \\"SCDL_ISSUE_DATE\\", \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_DATE\\", \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", \\"ISSUE_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_ISS_FLG\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_ISS_DATE\\", \\"ISSUE_INST_COMMENT\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"CONS_TYP\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"update " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"set " +" \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 2, " +" \\"OPR_INST_DATE\\" = ? " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR(\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_TYP\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\", \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_GNR_TYP\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", \\"ACPT_CMPLT_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\", \\"INSPC_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"INSPC_CMPLT_DATE\\", \\"CONFIRM_DLV_DATE\\", \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", \\"INV_CTRL_FLG\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_COMMENT\\", \\"ODR_CD\\", \\"DETAIL_NO\\", \\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", \\"TAX_RATE_1\\", \\"TAX_RATE_2\\", \\"TAX_RATE_3\\", \\"NET_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", \\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\", \\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"TAX_ROUND_TYP\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"EXCH_RATE\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, null, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, null, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 3, ?, 0, null, null, 2, 0, null, null, ?, ?, 1, ?, ?, ?, ?, null, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\" as \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"UNIT_COST\\" as \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROCESSING_COST\\" as \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"MATERIAL_COST\\" as \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\" as \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"DISC_AMOUNT\\" as \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\" as \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" as \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"OWN_PERSON_NAME\\" as \\"OWN_PERSON_NAME\\", " +" to_char(M_VEND_CTRL.\\"EXCH_TYP\\") as \\"EXCH_TYP\\", " +" M_CUR.CUR_CD as CUR_CD, " +" to_char(M_CUR.DECIMAL_FIG) as VEND_DECIMAL_FIG " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CUR.CUR_CD = nvl(M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD, SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD) " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" MIN(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") as \\"MIN_PROC_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = 1"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" as \\"PROC_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"
"select " +" MIN(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"PROC_NO\\") as \\"MIN_PROC_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD, " +" to_char(a.PROC_NO) " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" ( " +" select " +" WORK_ODR_CD, " +" min(PROC_NO) as PROC_NO " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" group by " +" WORK_ODR_CD " +" ) a " +"where " +" a.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD " +" and a.PROC_NO = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PROC_NO"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD, " +" M_WS.WH_CD, " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.PLANT_CD " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_WS " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.WS_CD = M_WS.WS_CD(+)"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WS_CD\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.COMPANY_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.VEND_CD, " +" M_WS.WH_CD, " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PLANT_CD " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" M_WS " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"WS_CD\\" = M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD, " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD, " +" M_WS.WH_CD, " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PLANT_CD " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC, " +" M_WS, " +" ( " +" select " +" min(PROC_NO) as PROC_NO, " +" WORK_ODR_CD " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +" where " +" WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and OUTSIDE_TYP = 1 " +" group by " +" WORK_ODR_CD " +" ) a " +"where " +" a.WORK_ODR_CD = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD " +" and a.PROC_NO = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.PROC_NO " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WS_CD = M_WS.WS_CD(+)"

"select " +" to_char(M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\", 'yyyy/mm/dd') as \\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" " +"from " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +"order by " +" M_CONS_UNIT_COST.\\"EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE\\" desc"
"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\") as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_EDITION\\" as \\"PS_EDITION\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_QTY\\" as \\"PS_UNIT_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ISSUE_TYP\\" as \\"ISSUE_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\") as \\"PS_UNIT_DENOMINATOR\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\") as \\"PS_UNIT_NUMERATOR\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PS_SPOIL\\" as \\"PS_SPOIL\\" " +"from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.MODIFY_COUNT) as CHECK_MODIFY_COUNT " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_ODR_CD = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC.WORK_IN_PROC_CD = ? " +"for update nowait"

"select " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_CD\\") as \\"OPR_INST_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PROC_NO\\") as \\"PROC_NO\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" as \\"l_WS_CD\\", " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"l_VEND_CD\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\") as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\") as \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\") as \\"l_OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\") as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST " +"where " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" VEND_ANAME " +"from " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +" and SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" and M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" M_WS.\\"WS_NAME\\" " +"from " +" M_WS " +"where " +" M_WS.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" value " +"from " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"where " +" name = 'TIME_CTRL'"
"select " +" MANHOUR_TYP " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" ITEM_CD = ? " +" and MANHOUR_TYP != 1"
"SELECT " +" VALUE AS \\"SPOIL_FLG\\" " +"FROM SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE NAME='SPOIL_FLG' " +" " +""

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST " +"where " +" V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" and to_char(V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') <= ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" like ? " +" and((V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?) " +" or (V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"WS_CD\\" = ?) " +" or (V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" = ? " +" and V_WORK_ODR_LST.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?)) " +" and ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
